alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:05PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Fremont County through 830 PM MDT... At 805 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Christina Lake, which is also 25 miles southwest of Lander, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Christina Lake around 815 PM MDT. Louis Lake and Fiddlers Lake around 820 PM MDT. South Pass City around 825 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
